com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.websites

Interface WebSpaceOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebSpaceOperationsImpl

    public interface WebSpaceOperations
    Operations for managing web spaces beneath your subscription.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebSpacesCreatePublishingUserResponse createPublishingUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, WebSpacesCreatePublishingUserParameters parameters)

    • Method Detail

      • createPublishingUser

        WebSpacesCreatePublishingUserResponse createPublishingUser(java.lang.String username,
                                                         java.lang.String password,
                                                         WebSpacesCreatePublishingUserParameters parameters)
                                                           throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                                  org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                  javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException,
                                                                  ServiceException
        Creates a source control user with permissions to publish to this web space.
        Parameters:
        username - Required. The user name.
        password - Required. The user password.
        parameters - Optional. Parameters supplied to the Create Publishing User operation.
        Returns:
        The Create Publishing User operation response.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was an error configuring the parser for the response body.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the response body.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if there was an error creating the DOM transformer.
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • get

        WebSpacesGetResponse get(java.lang.String webSpaceName)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                ServiceException,
                                javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException
        You can retrieve details for a specified web space name by issuing an HTTP GET request. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn167017.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        webSpaceName - Required. The name of the web space.
        Returns:
        The Get Web Space Details operation response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Thrown if there was an error parsing a URI in the response.

                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  ServiceException,
                                                  javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                  org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                  java.net.URISyntaxException
        You can retrieve a list of all web sites in a web space by issuing an HTTP GET request. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn236429.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        webSpaceName - Required. The name of the web space.
        parameters - Optional. Additional parameters.
        Returns:
        The List Web Sites operation response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Thrown if there was an error parsing a URI in the response.
